content: i saw a version of this at the store and said i can make that so voila here it is my goal with this pattern was to make it quick and easy for anyone to whip up for halloween plus i was able to make this a no sew pattern enjoy your new witchy halloween scrunchy connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
